Title: Colophon
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Inscriptions: [Transliteration] tammat al-Dībāchah [sic] Shahnāmah [sic] bi-tawfīq Allāh /1/ ta'ālá fī shuhūr sanat thamāniyah wa-'ishrīn wa-alf /2/ tamma tamma tamma /3/
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.601 contains a colophon at the end of the preface.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; India; Iran; History; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Firdawsi (Persian, died 411-416 AH/AD 1020-1025)
